org.apache.pulsar.broker.transaction.buffer

Interface TransactionMeta

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TransactionMetaImpl

    @Beta
public interface TransactionMeta
    The metadata for the transaction in the transaction buffer.

    • Method Summary
